name: Command_and_Conquer_Low_Power_Alerts-116
title: C&C Low Power Alerts
author: Jewel724/8ZN/Sil3ntSt0rm
description: Adds in three selectable sounds from Tiberian Sun, Red Alert and the older Command and Conquer titles to play with programmable speakers when your power supply cannot keep up with demands or shuts down. This was originally Jewel724's mod! Factorio 0.16-0.18 by 8ZN. Factorio 1.1 support by Sil3ntStorm
